mapper.delete: update sys_user set status =9 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id,username,account from sys_user where status !=9 and sys_user.`id` in (select user_id from sys_user_role where status!=9 and role_id = #{roleId})
select * from sys_user where email = #{email} limit 1
select count(*) from sys_user where email = #{email}
select * from sys_user where telno = #{telno} limit 1
SELECT * FROM sys_user where username=#{loginname} limit 1
mapper.update: update sys_user set password = #{password} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from sys_user where username like "%"#{username}"%"
mapper.update: update sys_user set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from sys_user where weichat = #{weichat} limit 1

select
from sys_user where sys_user.outId = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} limit 1
